title: Humble Bitcoiners
author: Humble Bitcoiners
content: Hi fellow Bitcoiners, need some fine silver bars/fine silver coins to melt them down for a future project.No collectors coins please. Don't wanna destroy any collectors value here. Pure working material is just fine.Greetings Humble
